4:
"Applications Config" provides advanced settings to make aText to work properly in any application.

To access "Applications Config":
    • Click aText menu → Shortcuts → Applications Config.
    • Or right-click on the Preferences button in the sidebar → Applications Config.

That is global "Applications Config". It affects all snippets.

There is also "Applications Config" for snippet group, which affects group's children snippets only.

Many workarounds utilize "Applications Config".
